thread.title: Douglas S. Martin Named Vice President, Residential Loan Officer at Encore Bank
thread.title_full: Douglas S. Martin Named Vice President, Residential Loan Officer at Encore Bank - PR.com

author: PR.com
title: Douglas S. Martin Named Vice President, Residential Loan Officer at Encore Bank
text:
Douglas S. Martin Named Vice President, Residential Loan Officer at Encore Bank
Fort Myers, FL, July 02, 2015 --( PR.com )-- Encore Bank is pleased to announce that Douglas S. Martin has joined the bank as Vice President, Residential Loan Officer. Encore Bank continues to expand its residential lending activities, which are managed by Senior Vice President, Dan Royal. Martin will work out of the Bonita Springs office.
Martin comes to Encore Bank with 16 years’ local lending experience in the Southwest Florida area. He specializes in all types of residential loans from FHA to Jumbo, and has developed many strong relationships with local Realtors over the years. He provides service at the highest level and has been recognized as a service leader for many years in Southwest Florida. Martin graduated Cum Laude from the University of Colorado at Denver in 1984, with majors in Finance and Accounting.
Encore Bank CEO Tom Ray said, “Doug brings a wealth of experience to Encore Bank. His many years of work as a loan officer in Southwest Florida will be a tremendous asset to our organization and our clients.”
Encore Bank has six convenient locations, including two branches in Naples at 3003 Tamiami Trail North and 2370 Vanderbilt Beach Road, Bonita Springs at 4450 Bonita Beach Road, Fort Myers at 7920 Summerlin Lakes Dr., Port Charlotte at 2120 Kings Highway, and Sun City Center at 1653 Sun City Center Plaza.
For more information, call 239.919.5888 or 239.594.3177 in Naples, 239.495.0243 in Bonita Springs, 239.278.5505 in Fort Myers, 941.258.3055 in Port Charlotte, or 813.634.8001 in Sun City Center, or visit www.encorebank.com. Member FDIC
